// shared sidebar nav (used in both doctor & patient dashboards) import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; export default function SidebarNav() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); return ( <> {/* Mobile menu button */} {/* Overlay for mobile */} {open && (
setOpen(false)} /> )} {/* Sidebar */}
MediSync
  • setOpen(false)}> Dashboard
  • setOpen(false)}> My Records
  • setOpen(false)}> Path Reports
  • setOpen(false)}> Access Logs
  • setOpen(false)}> Logout
); }
